name: RunForTea
description:
It's almost time for tea.

You will certainly be late and there is no option for you to attend empty-handed.

Try to collect as much milk, chocolate bars, doughnuts, and cupcakes as you can in time to avoid getting pissed off.

How to play

Arrow keys (or WASD keys) to move, spacebar to jump

If you go off the path, you can use the R key to return to the initial position.

Reference

(1) 3D model

Chocolate Bar by AbundanceGuy

Milk Chocolate Bar free 3D model | CGTrader

Donut by nemanjabadric

 Donut 3D Model - Game Ready free VR / AR / low-poly 3D model | CGTrader

Milk by GooPi (Misha)

 Carton of Milk 4K PBR | 3D 食べ物 | Unity Asset Store

Cupcake by jasonolawson

 Chocolate Cup Cake with Cherry on Top-Cake free VR / AR / low-poly 3D model | CGTrader

(2) BGM and SE

BGM "ゆっくり急げ！" by Musmus

激しい・熱い・アッパー系素材 (1/1) | フリーBGM・音楽素材 MusMus (main.jp)

Chocolate SE "決定、ボタン押下44"

Donut SE "決定、ボタン押下29"

Milk SE "キャンセル3"

Cupcake SE "決定、ボタン押下39"

above four SEs by 効果音ラボ

ボタン・システム音[1]｜効果音ラボ (soundeffect-lab.info)
